name: Color Bowling Play
description:
Color Bowling Play is an addictive ultimate arcade 3d bowling game for little kids to bowling master, let’s roll the ball to knock ball with tenpin bowling pins and win bowling challenge.
New bowling games here to strike ten pin bowling pins, test your bowling speed as a bowling master with consecutive strikes and spare to become bowling king in this bowling games 3d.
Features
* Touch & drag to roll the ball
* Get two chances to knock down ten pins
* Option to select different color & weight balls
